title: Miffy
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Palm Plus, Hilvershum, Kodansha, Meulenoff and Hertogenbosch
brief_description: Miffy is a familiar friend to generations of very young children. Together with Snuffy, Farmer John, Poppy Pig, Boris and Barbara, she features in the family of characters from Dick Bruna’s much loved children’s books. These simple yet captivating stories will take children into the delightful world of Miffy and her friends. 1-Miffy 2-Miffy’s bicycle 3-Miffy at school 4-I Know about numbers 5-Miffy goes flying 6-Farmer John 7-Miffy’s dream 8-Snuffy.
